name: User Documentation
tooltip: Write, maintain and deploy LOC Documentation, the official user's guide, SDK reference and a web-based code generation/unit test tool for FST Network's data product cloud platform, Logic Operating Centre (LOC).

name: Product White Paper Copywriting
tooltip: Write product white paper drafts for XREX Exchange's several cryptocurrency-related FinTech products (Spot Trading, Margin Trading, Secured Loan, XREX Staking, DeFi Staking, BitCheck, Deposit and Withdraw).
